results.name: Triangle T(n,k) (n>=1, rows have irregular lengths) giving number of arrangements of k nonattacking princes on an n X n staggered hexagonal torus board.
comment: A partition function for the staggered grid torus.
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, Feb 17 2002
